SIUE Virtual Tour Research Giving About SIUE About the University Points of Pride Leadership Mission, Goals & Plans Campuses Academics Academic Excellence An SIUE education will prepare you for a successful career and a life of purpose. Our broad-based, high-quality education allows students to put learning into practice with hands-on opportunities in modern labs and studios, and real-world experiences equip our students to thrive in the global marketplace and make their communities better places to live. Our academic programs hold the same national accreditation as other universities, but are offered at a lower price. That means we’re held to the highest standards of quality, but you can save thousands of dollars by choosing SIUE. Degrees & Programs See the degrees and programs offered.
